argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvscl.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvscl.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1st ` U ) = ( 1st ` U ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_nvvc | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> ( 1st ` U ) e. CVecOLD ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +v ` U ) = ( +v ` U ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_vafval | |- ( +v ` U ) = ( 1st ` ( 1st ` U ) ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_smfval | |- S = ( 2nd ` ( 1st ` U ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 5 | #P_bafval | |- X = ran ( +v ` U ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_vcass | |- ( ( ( 1st ` U ) e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A x. B ) S C ) = ( A S ( B S C ) ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A x. B ) S C ) = ( A S ( B S C ) ) ) |
